question:
You recently did a short coockery course. The coockery school has asked for your feedback on this course.
Write a letter to the course director at rhe coockery school. In your letter 
  describe what you enjoyed about the course
  say how much cooking you have done since the course 
 suggest another coockery course you would like the school to offer
text: I am writing to give some feedback on the short cookery course on 'pastries and buns' which was conducted by your renowned institute.
My name is Nimalka Nawalage  and I have successfully completed the above-mentioned course. Since I have gained a thorough knowledge from each and every lesson, I highly recommend it to anyone.

Moreover, Being experts in the field, all teachers demonstrated lessons clearly , right from the beginning. As they were friendly and willing to answer any questions, I had a wonderful time learning from them.

I am saying with confidence that I have mastered making all the items in the content including chicken puffs, fish pastries , and sausage buns. Recently, I  arranged a tea party for a few of my friends, and they were delighted with my cooking.
Furthermore,I would be grateful if you could offer another short programme on 'cakes' in the near future. This would  be advantageous for people like me, who want to be professional bakers one day.
